column4: I am doing 'su echo "blacklist pcspkr" >> /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist.conf' and getting a 'Permission Denied' - is it file in use, or why is it rejecting me?
I think 'su' probably doesn't work when the root account is locked (as is by default on ubuntu).
Try using 'sudo -s' for a root shell.
I had tried sudo first, dunno why I did 'su command', same error.  sudo -s worked.  Thanks!
